title: Herb Lubalin fat face type?
content:
Can’t pinpoint what this typeface is. It was designed by Herb Lubalin for a competition. It looks similar to Sahara Bodoni but not quite.

Any guesses?

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20081024060941im_/http:/typophile.com/files/1328284117_e686b68307_4478.jpg)

[http://www.flickr.com/photos/insect54/1328284117/in/set-7215760187854670...](http://web.archive.org/web/20081024060941/http:/www.flickr.com/photos/insect54/1328284117/in/set-72157601878546708/ "http://www.flickr.com/photos/insect54/1328284117/in/set-72157601878546708/")

author: jsheldon

comments.content: you rock! thanks for the fast reply.
